extDescription.message: Add a collect button next to Twitter/X tweets to save them to a local folder with one click.

actionTitle.description: The title of the browser action, shown on hover.

saveFormatLabel.description: Label for the file format selection.

openTweetBrowserButton.description: Button to open the tweet browser.

openHelpButton.description: Button to open the help page.

settingsSavedMessage.description: Message shown when settings are saved.

tweetBrowserTitle.description: Title for the tweet browser page.

filterTweetsLabel.description: Label for the filter section in tweet browser.

searchByContentLabel.description: Label for the content search input.

backButton.description: Button to go back from tweet detail view.

contextInvalidatedError.message: Error: Extension context invalidated. Please refresh the page and try again.
contextInvalidatedError.description: Error message for when the extension context is invalidated.

errorContextUnavailable.message: Context unavailable, please refresh the page.
errorContextUnavailable.description: Error message when the extension context is not available.

errorCannotExtract.message: Could not extract tweet data, please try again later.
errorCannotExtract.description: Error message when tweet data cannot be extracted.

successCollected.description: Success message when a tweet is collected.

errorRefreshPage.description: Short error message asking user to refresh.

errorSettingsNeeded.description: Short error message indicating settings are required.

errorNetwork.description: Short error message for network issues.

errorDownloadFailed.description: Short error message for download failures.

errorExtractionFailed.description: Short error message for data extraction failures.

errorCollectionFailed.description: Short error message for collection failures.

errorInitFailed.message: Initialization failed, please refresh the page and try again.
errorInitFailed.description: Error message when popup initialization fails.

errorLoadSettingsFailed.description: Error message when loading settings fails.

saving.description: Text on save button when saving.

settingsSavedSuccess.description: Success message when settings are saved.

errorSaveSettingsFailed.description: Error message when saving settings fails.

notifyLoadedTweets.description: Notification message when tweets are loaded successfully.

notifyLoadError.message: A critical error occurred during loading. Please check the console.
notifyLoadError.description: Notification message for a critical loading error.

emptyStateNoMatchesTitle.description: Title for the empty state when no tweets match filters.

emptyStateNoMatchesDescription.message: Try adjusting your search or filters
emptyStateNoMatchesDescription.description: Description for the empty state when no tweets match filters.

loadingTweets.description: Message shown when tweets are loading.

notifyTweetDeleted.description: Notification that a tweet has been deleted.

likesStat.description: Likes statistic in tweet detail view.

retweetsStat.description: Retweets statistic in tweet detail view.

tweetBrowserPageTitle.description: The title of the tweet browser page.

tweetBrowserHeaderDescription.message: View, search, and manage your collected tweets locally.
tweetBrowserHeaderDescription.description: The description in the header of the tweet browser page.

tweetBrowserSelectFolderButton.description: Button to select the folder containing tweets.

tweetBrowserSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the search box in the tweet browser.

tweetBrowserEmptyStateTitle.description: Title for the empty state in the tweet browser.

tweetBrowserEmptyStateDescription.message:
Click the "Select Tweet Folder" button above to select your saved tweet files (JSON or HTML format).
Supports selecting multiple files for browsing.
tweetBrowserEmptyStateDescription.description: Description for the empty state in the tweet browser.

tweetBrowserModalReplies.description: Label for replies in the tweet detail modal.

tweetBrowserModalRetweets.description: Label for retweets in the tweet detail modal.

tweetBrowserModalLikes.description: Label for likes in the tweet detail modal.

tweetBrowserModalViewOriginal.description: Link text to view the original tweet.
